Segment Insights on Liquid Waterproofing Membrane Market
The liquid waterproofing membrane market is segmented based on material type, application type, end-use type, construction type, and region.
Based on material type- Among material types, bitumen solidified its reign as the ultimate leader in the global liquid waterproofing membrane market, prevailing across major regions. Bitumen liquid membranes offer seamless application, conforming to irregular shapes and providing long-lasting protection against water infiltration. They are known for their ability to withstand weather elements and provide a reliable waterproofing solution. Additionally, their cost-effectiveness and wide availability make them a preferred choice in the construction industry.
PU liquid applied membrane waterproofing to depict the fastest growth in the foreseen future driven by its excellent adhesion properties, UV resistance, high elongation capabilities, and compatibility with various substrates. These qualities make PU-applied membranes an effective choice for reliable waterproofing in different applications. Additionally, their chemical resistance safeguards against damage from various substances. Some PU membranes are breathable, allowing moisture vapor to escape while still maintaining effective waterproofing.
Based on application type- The market is segmented into Roofing and Walls, Building Structures, Industrial, Water and Wastewater Management, Tunnels, and Others. Roofing and Walls dominate the global liquid waterproofing membrane market with a mammoth share. Waterproofing plays a crucial role in preventing leaks and protecting the underlying structure, ensuring the longevity and integrity of the building. With roofs often covering significant surface areas, such as commercial or industrial buildings, proper waterproofing is essential to safeguard the entire structure and its contents from water-related issues.
